This page on SteamDB lists all the Steam games categorized under the 'Shooter' genre tag. Shooter games are a popular and diverse category within gaming, encompassing various sub-genres such as First-Person Shooters (FPS), Third-Person Shooters, and Rail Shooters. In these games, players typically engage in combat by using firearms, projectiles, or energy weapons to eliminate targets, often while navigating environments and tackling objectives. The shooter tag includes a wide range of titles from classic action games and military simulations to science fiction adventures and competitive multiplayer arenas, offering diverse gameplay experiences for players.
